document_data.name: Guardian
document_data.mainbody: '''''Guardian''''' was a spell unique to [[Maztica]]. It alerted a caster of an approaching creature.
document_data.Effects: The spell required the caster to select the specific size of creature they wanted to be warned about. The spell did not identify an approaching creature and only alerted of the presence of living creatures, it did not warn of the approach of an [[undead]] creature. The spell's warning was able to wake a caster from even a deep restful sleep.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]]: the ears from a [[bat]].
